meaningMnemonic: This is the adverb version of the kanji <kanji>big</kanji>. It's a little thing you can put in front of things to say that they are "<vocabulary>in a big way</vocabulary>" or "<vocabulary>on a grand scale</vocabulary>."
readingMnemonic: Since you already know the reading of the vocab word 大きい, you should be able to read this word as well.
